title: [Iceman : publicity kit]
creator_credit: Patrick Palmer, Norman Jewison and Fred Schepisi
brief_description: Publicity kit for the production Iceman (1984), including 7 B&W Stills (Large), 1 Press Kit/ Review. Director Fred Schepisi, Starring Timothy Hutton, John Lone, Lindsay Crouse.
